courses.title: Introduction to Music Theory
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of music theory including notes, scales, and basic harmony.

courses.title: Guitar Basics
courses.description: A hands-on course for beginners to learn the basics of guitar playing.

courses.title: Piano Techniques
courses.description: Explore intermediate piano techniques and expand your repertoire.

courses.title: Vocal Training
courses.description: Develop your vocal skills and techniques in a supportive environment.

courses.title: Music Composition
courses.description: Learn the art of composing music and develop your unique style.
